title: Full Stack Developer
description: Worked with 4 teams on a banking project; mentored 2 interns; ensured timely delivery using Agile/Scrum.
Developed 3 responsive portals using Spring MVC, ReactJS, HTML and CSS for dynamic UIs.
Built REST APIs with Java 21, Spring Boot, Hibernate; integrated SQL and MongoDB.
Managed 8 microservices with Bitbucket; used Kafka, Docker, and Kubernetes for deployment.
Set up Tomcat, Jenkins (6 projects), AWS Lambda, S3, CloudWatch, and Grafana for CI/CD and monitoring.
Validated 30+ APIs via Postman and JUnit, improving bug detection by 90%.

title: Software Engineer
description: Built 15+ scalable warehouse pages with ReactJS/Spring Boot using Agile and Jenkins to speed delivery.
Migrated 35+ components from AngularJS to Vue.js, improving load time by 40% and cutting maintenance 25%.
Created responsive UIs with Tailwind/Bootstrap and 20+ reusable components for UI consistency.
Wrote unit tests with Jest, reducing defects by 35% and speeding feedback via CI integration.
Built REST APIs for inventory and shipment tracking, improving data consistency and API speed by 35%.
Used Playwright for integration tests, reaching 96% coverage and minimizing prod bugs.
Cut error rates from 2.5% to 0.5% through code optimization and proactive fixes.
Led code reviews, mentored UI interns, and promoted best practices for high-quality delivery.
Built POC with fabricJS for dynamic layouts, reducing item search time by 50%.

title: Software Developer
description: Built 3 full-stack apps with Django, integrating frontend and backend seamlessly.
Created a secure voting system with authentication, vote validation, and fraud prevention.
Designed a 5-table MySQL schema, boosting query speed by 30% and ensuring data integrity.
Implemented role-based auth with session timeouts in Django to enhance security.
